level.heading: Advisory Neighborhood Commissions--Determination of election winners.
level.text: The candidate in each single-member district receiving the highest number of votes cast in such election shall be declared the winner, except that in the case of a tie the procedures set forth in § 1-1001.10(c) shall govern.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-21, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-309.01.
